content: a row between them hat row ear ❖ arms + legs so sorry that i forgot to write down the exact row anyways sew the arms a little bit above ½ of the body the arms are placed on the side of the body the legs should be placed towards the ends of the body and a little diagonal to the eyes not exactly on the side of the body but a little bit before that ❖ mouth cut out a small rounded triangular shape for the nose and wait to glue the nose on for a moment take your brown yarn that you used for the hat start from where you are going to place the nose and go to the middle of the area middle of where you are gluing on the nose make a straight line with the yarn ~2 row below then insert the yarn around two stitches to the left and make a straight line go to the middle of the line and insert the yarn into that stitch place the yarn over the straight line stitch you made and insert it back into the same stitch repeat it for the right side sew in yarn glue on the nose unedited larger photos
